summary: Fixes the idle turn and sprint animation in third person.
descriptionHtml:
Seemed to be getting a lot of people wondering how to install.

HOW TO INSTALL: Simply place the \"meshes\" folder into your Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data directory.

UPDATE: Decided to add a turn fix only optional file that retains the original sprint animation for people who generally don\'t read comments etc.

Changed the third person idle turn and sprint animation whilst dual wielding weapons.

Requested by a friend.

Hands no longer jitter around when turning and the sprint animation is no longer overdone with the arms swinging right behind your back.

Files up my bad, site loading slow + messed up description and had to rewrite so I forgot.

Video isn\'t loading in the video section for me so I\'ll chuck this link here.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UZJXTHHEWCY&
author: imeltfaces and Bethesda
